title: Society Annual General Meeting
content:
Dear Residents,

We are pleased to announce that the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of our society will be held on December 15, 2024, at 6:00 PM in the community hall.

Agenda:
- Review of last year's activities
- Financial report presentation
- Election of new committee members
- Discussion on upcoming projects

All residents are requested to attend this important meeting. Light refreshments will be served.

Best regards,
Society Management Committee
author: Society Secretary

title: Water Supply Maintenance
content:
Dear Residents,

Please be informed that there will be scheduled water supply maintenance on December 10, 2024, from 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM. During this time, water supply will be temporarily suspended.

We apologize for the inconvenience and request your cooperation.

Thank you for your understanding.
author: Maintenance Team

title: Diwali Celebrations
content:
Dear Residents,

We are excited to announce the Diwali celebrations in our society on November 12, 2024, starting at 6:00 PM.

Program:
- Traditional lighting ceremony
- Cultural performances
- Community dinner
- Fireworks display

All residents and their families are cordially invited to join the celebrations.

Let's make this Diwali memorable together!
author: Cultural Committee

title: Security Update
content:
Dear Residents,

We would like to inform you that we have upgraded our security system with new CCTV cameras and access control systems. The new system will be operational from December 1, 2024.

Please ensure that all family members and domestic help are registered with the security office.

For any queries, please contact the security office.

Thank you for your cooperation.
author: Security Team

title: Garden Maintenance Schedule
content:
Dear Residents,

Our garden maintenance team will be working on the following schedule:

- Monday to Friday: 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM
- Sunday: 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM

Please avoid parking vehicles in the garden area during these hours.

Thank you for your cooperation.
author: Garden Maintenance Team
